example.eg: There is an amazing view out the window.
example.egtrans: 从窗子看出去，景色美极了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 景色, 景观, 风景

example.eg: What is your view on the situation in Africa?
example.egtrans: 你对非洲局势有何看法？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 观点, 看法, 见解

example.eg: The politicians viewed the disaster area.
Many people view tattoos negatively.
A million people have viewed that clip of the talking cat.
example.egtrans: 有100万人已经观看过那个说话猫咪的小短片。

example.eg: They stopped at a high place for a view of the city.
example.egtrans: 他们站在高处，眺望整座城市。

example.eg: The city disappeared from view.
example.egtrans: 那座城市从视野中消失。

example.eg: She picked the flower for a closer view.
He left with the view to returning shortly.
example.egtrans: 他离开了，但是打算尽快回来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 目的, 打算, 意图

dsense.name: view
dsense.guideword: (unique view of video file) (网络上对视频的)

example.eg: That Youtube video has 10,000 views.
example.egtrans: 那个Youtube视频有一万次观看记录。

example.eg: Before we bought this house, we viewed five others.
example.egtrans: 购买这房子之前，我们还看了其他5栋。

example.eg: I view that idea with suspicion.
The government viewed the latest scandal as a disaster.
example.egtrans: 政府把最近一次丑闻看作是一场灾难。

example.eg: I got a bird's-eye view of the Atlantic as my plane flew over it.
His privileged background left him with a distorted view of poverty.
The tilted position of the camera provides a deliberately distorted view of the building.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扭曲的画面, 扭曲的图像

example.eg: The bill has in view two types of sanctions.
The suspect was arrested in full view of his wife and children.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 让...眼睁睁地看着, 在...亲眼目睹之下

example.eg: The deer stood in plain view in the field in front of us.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 视野开阔地, 视线清晰地, 能清楚看见地

example.eg: They were kissing in public view at the station and didn't care if anyone saw them.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在公共场合地, 公开地, 众目睽睽之下

example.eg: The castle is in view on top of the hill.
The expansion of the company is in view.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在考虑中, 作为目标

example.eg: In view of your actions, you'll have to leave.
example.egtrans: 考虑到你的行为举止，你必须离开。

dsense.name: in view of the fact that

example.eg: In view of the fact that it's raining hard, we are going to cancel the game.
People go before a judge because they want an objective point of view.
The exhibits on view at the gallery represent a period of history that many have little knowledge of.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 网页浏览量, 访问量

example.eg: The image is a panoramic view of the whole world as seen from space.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 广阔视角, 宏观角度

example.eg: That's my own point of view; you may well disagree with me!
example.egtrans: 虽说你很可能不同意，不过那就是我的观点。

example.eg: There are too many tall people in front of me; I need to move to get a better point of view.
example.egtrans: 我前面有太多高个头的人，我需要换个地方以获得一个更好的视角。

example.eg: From the front, the house was charming, but the rear view was hideous.

dsense.name: rearview mirror, rear-view mirror, driving mirror

example.eg: Good drivers regularly check their rearview mirrors to see what's happening behind them.
example.egtrans: 一个好的司机会经常看后视镜，检查后方情况。

example.eg: There's a magnificent scenic view from the top of the mountain.
Her parents took a dim view of her choice of boyfriends.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…不乐观, 对…不以为然

example.eg: I view your shortcomings as a challenge.

dsense.name: wing mirror, side-view mirror, side mirror
dsense.guideword: (small mirror at either side of a vehicle)

example.eg: I worked hard with a view to applying to a good university.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 考虑到, 鉴于, 为了, 指望

example.eg: His worldview's much more optimistic than mine.
